messages.content: Do you have any feedback for me, or suggestions of things I should learn?
Thanks for your response! Your feedback will help me become more intelligent over time. ## How helpful did you find me today?
Great! Would you recommend me to someone you know?
Got it, thank you for the feedback my friend! ## If you have any further questions, or were unable to find the information you need, you can call 211, or chat at https://211ontario.ca/chat/
If you have an immediate medical emergency, please contact 911. ## I have crisis hotlines for:

messages.content: Here are things I can recommend for you to do during the day:

intents.name: Crisis_WomensHelpLine
sampleUtterances: how can I get away from my partner

messages.content:
It sounds like you may be experiencing domestic violence. ## Domestic violence can happen with a partner, friend, coworker or parent. Here are some of the types of violence: ## Physical Violence:
- Inducing harm like hitting ## Sexual Violence:
- Sexual activity that is without consent ## Emotional Violence:
- Narcissistic behavior, manipulation, making partner feel "crazy" ## Financial Violence:
- Control over, restricting access to money ## Reproductive Violence:
- Control over contraceptives (condoms, birth control) ## The Assaulted Women's HelpLine 416-863-0511 provides crisis counselling, emotional support, information and referrals to emergency shelters, legal information and community services, and resources for abused women. TTY 1-866-863-7868. Confidental online chat: https://www.awhl.org/online-chat
